title: Slow Chocolate Autopsy
description: Slow Chocolate Autopsy : Incidents from the Notorious Career of Norton, Prisoner of LondonA highly original collabortion between cult novelist Iain Sinclair and cult comics artist dave McKean, combining text and graphics in a paranoid and dystopian vision of london, following the central character, Norton, who is trapped within the city of London, but not in time...
author: Iain Sinclair
